oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Six Mile Grist Mill
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Black and white photograph of a grist mill. Alse Potter operated this grist mill in the Six Mile Community. Men (left to right) are identified as Alse Potter, Murphy "Murph" Abraham Heaton (1847-1930),his son William David "Dave" Heaton (1867-1918) and an unidentified boy sitting atop a horse is also in the picture.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Looking Back at Tennessee Photograph Collection, 1890-1981
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Mills; Men
